title: Thoughts on Colin Kaepernick workout
itunes:title: Thoughts on Colin Kaepernick workout
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines after Colin Kaepernick caused controversy over the weekend after he changed venues for where he will be working out for the 25 teams that showed up to watch him work out, so we wanted to hear what our listeners had to think. Also we had Maury stop by to speak about his new game, politics, and maybe have got himself in a little bit of trouble when it came to his relationship with his wife. In addition, Charlamagne also gave his "Donkey of the Day" to a police officer who pinned down a 15-Year-Old Quadruple Amputee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
